title.narrative: Her Majesty's Revenue & Customs Techincal Support to Federal Board of Revenue Pakistan

description.narrative: This activity (Her Majesty's Revenue & Customs Techincal Support to Federal Board of Revenue Pakistan) is a component of Stability and Growth Programme reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £866,298. This component benefits Pakistan, and works in the following sector(s): Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: HM Revenue and Customs. The start date is 19-03-2015 and the end date is 31-12-2019.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
